entries.title_d: Black Epsilon wants to keep it's advantage in the region. In order to do that they need to make patrols of the region keeping a close watch out for Rebel activity. You are to make a patrol of Corellian space scanning for Rebel ships.
entries.title: Corellia System: Patrol the Corellia System
entries.splitquestbody: Local space scanning craft have detected a group of Rebel X-wing in your vicinity.  Your orders are to destroy them completely.
entries.split_quest_alert: Alert! Rebel craft detected in the area.
entries.quest_patrol_d: When you reach a navigation waypoint you will receive a new one to the next location. Follow the patrol waypoints until you come to the end of your patrol.
entries.quest_location_d: Travel to the Corellia system and follow the patrol navigation waypoints. As you reach one navigation waypoint, you will get a new waypoint to the next location on the patrol route.
